Title: Teen Strategy
Text: Teen sat playing games console in messy bedroom. Carer knocks on the door and walks in...

Options.Description: We've got to go out soon - get off that blasted computer! And look at the state of this room! When is the last time you cleaned it?

We're leaving in half an hour. Can you finish playing your game, get changed and be ready in the kitchen by 7 o'clock. I will give you a reminder in 15 minutes. If you are still on the console, I will turn it off.
"We need to go out soon." Teen shouts back, "Ok." Without diverting their attention from the game.
Requests they come off the computer game to go out later. Teen isn't really listening.
